house_listing.house_description: This 2 level single family home built in 1939 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) . Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Guest House, TraditionalStyle
